
```{r}
#| echo: false

library(htmltools)
library(fontawesome)

source("../code/functions_talks.R")

# bibliography loading
bibliography <- read.csv("../data/talks.csv")

# Summary body
tagList(
  # anim js dependencies
  js_anim(),

  # grid
  div(
    class = "grid",

    # Publications
    accordeon_mult_code(
       data = bibliography,
       id = "accordeon", 
       show = FALSE
    )
  ),
)
```
